Silver Guidelines

Below is a list of guidelines that have been added to this prototype system:

Guideline 1-1-1: Non-Visual Text - All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose

Guideline 1-1-2: Audio-only and Video-only Time Based Media - For prerecorded audio-only and prerecorded video-only media, the following are true, except when the audio or video is a media alternative for text and is clearly labeled

Guideline 2-1-2: Keyboard (Understanding) - All functionality of the content is operable through a keyboard interface without requiring specific timings for individual keystrokes, except where the underlying function requires input that depends on the path of the user's movement and not just the endpoints
